snippet.title: YGO Omega Trailer 2
snippet.description:
YGO Omega is a new and upcoming free fan-made simulator made from scratch. 

There are many features not shown in this trailer (otherwise it would be too long). You can join us on discord and read the faq for a full list.

**Upcoming features**: (prior to release)
- Automatic Tournament mode with point system
- Statistics for card usage, meta decks, etc.
- Test Hand mode

**Note**: TCG card scripts (those with different printed effects are already in this game). The TCG ruling where they treat non-public cards (in hand and face-down) as same priority as public cards, is not in this game, and is currently the only difference between tcg vs ocg not addressed.
Read more here: https://forum.duelistsunite.org/t/tcg-vs-ocg-rulings-the-story-so-far/97

Discord: https://discord.gg/duelistsunite

Twitch: twitch.tv/duelists_unite (We stream live gameplay and do tournaments almost every other week)

Site: https://duelistsunite.org

To sign up for our 3rd cycle of Closed Beta testers, you can fill out this survey:
https://forms.gle/MpAecfVwYJT9YMtT7 (You must be in the discord to participate)

Music, sounds, icons, logos, and other graphics used in this game were made by our team and are not copyrighted by anyone else.
